name: Planet Defense (SooD)
description:
Planet Defense is a tower defense game where you need to defend you planet against an onslaught of asteroids.

Build laser and missile turrets to shoot out asteroids. Power them with power plants and power nodes. Then sit back and enjoy the light show.

Note: Forgot to add the cost of construction in the game, so I'm putting it here for now -

  • Power Plant: 50
  • Mine: 50
  • Laser Turret: 100
  • Missile Turret: 400
  • Power Hub: 10
